themes: support for mid-career and legacy artists
focus on jazz and cultural preservation
key_phrases: programs that support mid-career and legacy artists
particularly in jazz, cultural preservation, and historically underrepresented disciplines
archival and education-focused funding for initiatives like HPPAA
technical assistance for small orgs (grant writing, production, digital media)
create youth mentorships and artist residencies that pair emerging talent with experienced creatives
prioritize low-cost rehearsal and performance spaces
barriers_identified: lack of support for mid-career and legacy artists
limited technical assistance for small organizations
lack of affordable rehearsal and performance spaces
solutions_proposed: offer programs supporting mid-career and legacy artists
offer technical assistance for small organizations (grant writing, production, digital media)
create youth mentorships and artist residencies pairing emerging talent with experienced creatives
prioritize low-cost rehearsal and performance spaces
